Interface Updater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaDeltaUpdater, AdaGradUpdater, AdamUpdater, BaseUpdater, LayerUpdater, MultiLayerUpdater, NesterovsUpdater, NoOpUpdater, RmsPropUpdater, SgdUpdater

    public interface Updater
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Update the model

      • stateSizeForLayer

        int stateSizeForLayer(Layer layer)
        Calculate and return the state size for this updater (for the given layer). How many parameters/values does this updater have?
        Parameters:
        layer - Layer that this updater belongs to
        Returns:
        number of parameters/values in the updater state
